duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by establishing KPIs and monitoring achievements.
Coaching AEs on improvement of skills and knowledge via face to face and digital channels.
Serving as a key driver for setting/surpassing sales objectives and developing market strategies.
Providing accurate forecasts, attracting and retaining talented account executives.
Participating in the sales process on key accounts and maintaining positive customer relationships.
Ensuring adoption and consistent use of sales tech stack applications (Salesforce, Salesloft, Seismic, Consensus).
